text: Hi, Can we recover the deleted saved sections we made in the theme ?

Hey fellow developers! :wave:
What's the best way to have "backend" in HubSpot? I mean, for example if I want to make API requests from my modules/website, which is built with HubSpot modules? Serverless (expensive) functions is the only way to have it? or Zapier/Make.com? What's the other, reasonable way to have that?

It depends on the number of requests you want to make, but i've built a few workflows using custom coded steps making API calls which works well.
We also use Make for other bits that don't work well in workflows, which I think is better value that Zapier (we pay around $600 a year for 480k operations.)
good morning all, is there a way to schedule social post for instagram and viewing them into the grid before publishig in HubSpot?

:orange_heart:*Please take a moment to review our Code of Conduct*:orange_heart:

We want the HubSpot Developer community to be inclusive and welcoming. By following our Code of Conduct, you can help ensure that's the case.

TL;DR:
• Be respectful
• Be inclusive (try not to say, "Hey guys, hey boys, hey [any specific group]")
• No self promotion, except for <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> and <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> 
• No unsolicited DMs
Read the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct|whole thing here> - and thanks for being a part of the HubSpot Developer Community!

Want to report a violation? DM <@UQNEXHW14> or fill out the <https://form.asana.com/?k=p7aM0fpd3G4JGETDL_nYXg&d=8587152060687|anonymous form here>.

Really depends on what you need to create, let's first say that if your content needs to be indexed / is importand for SEO currently there's no way to fetch external data and render it on the page via SSR, if you just need to fetch data client side I guess you could use anything? (like vercel free tier should be more that enough for most serverless functions)
is there a way to do this?

Hi everyone, I am using HubSpot for user payments and subscriptions. I can read the payment subscription data using subscription api.
But is there any way to cancel payment subscription from external app based on api or inside HubSpot workflow trigger ?
is there a service out there that dumps all my HubSpot into a postgresDB automagically in sync? (I only need 1 way sync not 2 way sync
You can do that with Segment: HubSpot as a source, postgres as warehouse destination: <https://segment.com/docs/connections/sources/catalog/cloud-apps/HubSpot/>
Ideally I just click a button and it gives me a sql endpoint + password to hit, no work to do
what’s the best practice for pushing a rel canonical into the header from a module on a certain set of dynamic pages?
You mean {{ require_js("[ url link here ]", "header") }} ?

mm, I’ve got two sets of dynamic pages driven by ‘counselors’ db table - one set is /counselors/^hs_path^ and the other is /intake/^hs_path^

there’s really no navigable way to get to the /intake/ directory, but just in case google finds it I want to refer them to /counselors instead

So, I’m doing this but getting two canonicals (i guess i can turn off the auto one, and canonize every page)
`{% set canon = request.scheme ~ "://" ~ request.domain ~ request.path | replace("/intake/","/counselors/") %}`
      `<link rel="canonical" href="{{ canon }}">`
